DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study help understand benefit eat food supplement fiber form sugarcane bagasse ( leftover fiber cane juice extract ) glucose metabolism body weight .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Effects Short Term Sugarcane Bagasse Supplementation
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator employ double-blind randomized control study design 3 arm obese , insulin resistant adult randomly select receive food make 1 ) sugarcane bagasse , 2 ) non-caloric , non-fermentable fiber , 3 ) similar product minimal fiber 4 week . The intervention form brownie cooky look taste nearly identical . Caloric value constant three delivery system . Subjects blood test body composition analysis intervention .
DOC.criteria: Males female age 1850 year Body Mass Index ≥ 30 kg/m2 ( ratio weight height ) Fasting insulin level > 5 µIU/mL , determine test perform screen Women pregnant Past medical history diabetes History intestinal surgery removal bowel History problem absorb food celiac disease , inflammatory bowel disease , malabsorption syndrome Taking chronic medication medical condition diabetes , hypertension , cholesterol , thyroid hormone , etc . Any food allergy
DOC.keyword: Sugarcane bagasse , glucose tolerance , insulin resistance
